#summary List of all keyboard shortcuts

= Keyboard Shortcuts =

||Ctrl-x||The control key based shortcuts are used for frequently used editing commands.||
||Alt-x||The alternate key is used for commands which depend on the mode that you are in.||
||Meta-x||The meta key is used for general purpose commands, which can be used in all modes.||
||Hyper-x||The hyper key is used for producing special symbols like Greek characters in math mode.||

*Remark: By default Meta key is the Windows key in Windows and is the Command key in Mac OS.*

== Generic Commands ==

|| *Generic Commands* || *Windows Style* || *MacOS Style* || *Emacs Style* ||
|| new document || Ctrl+N || Cmd+N || Meta+F2 ||
|| new window || Shift+Ctrl+N || Shift+Cmd+N || Meta+Shift+F2 ||
|| open document || Ctrl+O || Cmd+O || F2 ||
|| open in new window || Shift+Ctrl+O || Shift+Cmd+O || Shift+F2 ||
|| clone new window || Meta+Ctrl+C || Ctrl+Cmd+C || Meta+Ctrl+F2 ||
|| save document || Ctrl+S || Cmd+S || F3 ||
|| save document as || Shift+Ctrl+S || Shift+Cmd+S || Shift+F3 ||
|| revert document || Shift+Ctrl+R || Shift+Cmd+R || Ctrl+F2 ||
|| print preview || Ctrl+P || Cmd+P || F4 ||

|| print selection || Meta+Ctrl+P || Ctrl+Cmd+P || Meta+F4 ||
|| close current document || Ctrl+W || Cmd+W || Ctrl+X K ||
|| quit program || Ctrl+Q || Cmd+Q || Ctrl+X Ctrl+C ||

|| spell || Meta+$ || Cmd+$ || Meta+$ ||
|| presentation mode || Ctrl+F9 || Ctrl+F9 || Ctrl+F9 ||
|| browse backward || Ctrl+< || Ctrl+> || Ctrl+< ||

|| browse the start || Meta+< || Meta+< || Meta+< ||
